price: Zar od drugih tražite da dobro čine dok pri tome sebe zaboravljate, a vi Knjigu čitate? Zar se opametiti nećete!?
arabic: ۞ أَتَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَتَنسَوۡنَ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَتۡلُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: atamurūna al-nāsa bil-biri watansawna anfusakum wa-antum tatlūna al-kitāba afalā taʿqilūna
